name: Basic Evaluation Suite
description: Core evaluation tests for LLM responses

test_cases.name: JSON Output Format
test_cases.description: Tests that the model can produce valid JSON output
test_cases.prompt: Generate a JSON object representing a user with fields: name (string), age (number), email (string). Respond with only the JSON.

test_cases.name: Citation in RAG Response
test_cases.description: Tests that citations are included when answering from context
test_cases.prompt: What is the vacation policy? Include source citations in your answer.
test_cases.context:
Company Policy Document:

Vacation Policy: All full-time employees receive 20 days of paid vacation per year. Vacation requests must be submitted 2 weeks in advance.

test_cases.name: Grounded Response
test_cases.description: Tests that the model doesn't hallucinate information
test_cases.prompt: Based on the context, what is the maximum vacation carryover?
test_cases.context:
Vacation Policy:
- Full-time employees: 20 days per year
- Part-time employees: 10 days per year
- Requests require 2 weeks notice

test_cases.name: Response Consistency
test_cases.description: Tests that the model gives consistent answers

test_cases.name: JSON Array Output
test_cases.prompt: Generate a JSON array of 3 colors with 'name' and 'hex' fields. Respond with only the JSON.
